document_data.mainbody:
Tantra Jaressras Fine Gowns was a small shop that dealt in sewing, relating, cleaning, and importing fashionable gowns and revel wear that was located on Saerdoun Street in the North Ward of Waterdeep in the late 15 century DR.
Tantra Jaressras Fine Gowns shared a three-story-and-an-attic building with a number of other businesses. The building stood on the southern side of Saerdoun Street, three doors west from the intersection with Thunderstaff Way. Other tenants of the office building were Erro Alhandrars Nets, Demra Samdros Best Beds, Laskalans Lamps and Lanterns, and Vressas Sweep Begone, as well as Tigers Eye at one point.
Tantra Jaressras shop was established sometime before the building changed management in the , when it came into the hands of a gnome named Hardyn Glorjarn, who took over the buildings attic.
